title: Brain of Confusion
info: The Brain of Confusion is an Expert Mode accessory item from the Treasure Bag dropped by the Brain of Cthulhu. Upon taking damage with the Brain of Confusion equipped, nearby enemies have 60% chance of getting the Confused debuff, with the chance and duration increased by 0.4% per point of damage.
